properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 5:00AM CST until February 6 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Warning for the
following rivers in Middle Alabama...Tennessee...

Shoal Creek Near Iron City affecting Lauderdale and Lawrence Counties

.Heavy rainfall on Wednesday has caused Shoal Creek to rise above flood stage
this morning.

The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Shoal Creek Near Iron City
* From early this morning until this evening.
* At 4AM Thursday the stage was...13.9 feet
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage early this morning and
continue rising to near 14.5 feet late this morning. The river will fall
below flood stage later today.
* At 14.0 feet...Flooding of low lying areas along Shoal Creek begins.
properties.instruction:
Avoid flooded areas along the river...And move personal belongings to higher
ground. Never drive through flooded roads as the depth of water may be too great
to pass...Even in trucks or sport utility vehicles. If you come across a flooded
road...Turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
